import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Icon } from 'react-icons-kit'; import {x} from 'react-icons-kit/feather/x'; import {mapPin} from 'react-icons-kit/feather/mapPin' class inputChips extends Component { deleteChip(chip) { let index = this.state.chips.indexOf(chip); if (index >= 0) { this.setState({ chips: update( this.state.chips, { $splice: [[index, 1]] } ) }); } } render() { let chips = this.state.chips.map((chip, index) => { return (
{ this.deleteChips() }} />
); }); } } export default inputChips;
